remarks: Lemma for ~ ghgrpOLD .  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 25-Apr-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-May-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ghgrpOLD.1 $e |- ( ph -> F : X -onto-> Y ) $.
ghgrplem1OLD.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ w e. X ) -> ps ) $.
ghgrplem1OLD.3 $e |- ( C = ( F ` w ) -> ( ch <-> ps ) ) $.
ghgrplem1OLD $p |- ( ( ph /\ C e. Y ) -> ch ) $.
$d C w $.
$d F w $.
$d X w $.
$d Y w $.
$d ch w $.
$d ph w $.
